comments.body: Return value of [`getBucketsStream`](https://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-node/#/docs/storage/1.2.0/storage?method=getBucketsStream) seems to be a plain `ReadStream`, not a `Promise`.

`generation` seems to be [only for buckets](https://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-node/#/docs/storage/1.2.0/storage/bucket?method=acl.add).

> File Objects Only

- `destination` should be `string | File`
- also takes an `options?` object

```typescript
interface OperationOptions {
    userProject: boolean
}
```

Not sure `OperationOptions` makes the most sense as a name.

[doc](https://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-node/#/docs/storage/1.2.0/storage/bucket?method=combine)

Also takes a `key: string` option, at least for the [`Bucket.file` method](https://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-node/#/docs/storage/1.2.0/storage/bucket?method=file).

>  A custom encryption key
Also takes a `userProject: boolean` option. or is it `userProject?: boolean`?

Also takes a `userProject?: boolean` option. But only for `makePrivate` and not for [makePublic](https://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-node/#/docs/storage/1.2.0/storage/bucket?method=makePublic)? Docs may be wrong

Looking at [the source](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/google-cloud-node/blob/storage-1.2.0/packages/storage/src/bucket.js#L1071), looks like BucketMetadata will have everything from the [Bucket representation in the JSON API](https://cloud.google.com/storage/docs/json_api/v1/buckets#resource). If that's true, then I see more stuff to add like `cors`, `website`.

[Documentation](https://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-node/#/docs/storage/1.2.0/storage/file?method=createReadStream) says the return value is a `ReadableStream`, not `fs.ReadStream`. May not make a difference in practice?

Same for [`createWriteStream`](https://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-node/#/docs/storage/1.2.0/storage/file?method=createWriteStream) <-> `WritableStream`.

`max` and `min` are part of [contentLengthRange](https://googlecloudplatform.github.io/google-cloud-node/#/docs/storage/1.2.0/storage/file?method=getSignedPolicy): I think they can be removed from `SignedPolicyOptions`
